import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Leaf, Droplets, Thermometer, LineChart, CalendarClock, AlertCircle, MapPin, CheckCircle2, } from "lucide-react"; export function AnalysisResults({ analysis, isAnalyzing, weather, location, aiSoilType, aiConfidence, }) { const [selectedCropIndex, setSelectedCropIndex] = useState(0); // whenever a new analysis comes in, reset selected crop to first one useEffect(() => { if (analysis && analysis.recommendedCrops?.length) { setSelectedCropIndex(0); } }, [analysis]); const hasAnalysis = !!analysis; // ------- LOADING STATES / EMPTY STATE ------- if (isAnalyzing && !hasAnalysis) { return (

Analyzing Soil…

We’re processing your image, estimating soil type, and matching the best crops for your location and weather.

{/* simple skeleton */}
); } if (!hasAnalysis) { return (

No Analysis Yet

Upload a clear, close-up photo of your soil to see the detected soil type, pH, moisture, and crop recommendations.

Tip: Avoid shadows and include only soil in the frame for best results.

); } // ------- MAIN CONTENT WHEN ANALYSIS EXISTS ------- const selectedCrop = analysis.recommendedCrops?.[selectedCropIndex] || analysis.recommendedCrops?.[0]; return (
{/* Header / summary */}

Analysis Results

AI-powered insights based on your soil image, local weather, and climate.

{aiSoilType && (

Model Prediction

{aiSoilType}

{aiConfidence != null && (

Confidence: {(aiConfidence * 100).toFixed(1)}%

)}
)}
{/* info banner */} {(analysis.weatherAdjustment || analysis.locationAdjustment) && (
{analysis.weatherAdjustment &&

{analysis.weatherAdjustment}

} {analysis.locationAdjustment &&

{analysis.locationAdjustment}

}
)} {/* Soil basics cards */}
Soil Type

{analysis.soilType}

{analysis.texture}

pH Level

{analysis.pH}

{analysis.pH < 6 ? "Slightly acidic" : analysis.pH > 7 ? "Slightly alkaline" : "Near neutral"}

Moisture

{analysis.moisture}

N: {analysis.nutrients.nitrogen} • P:{" "} {analysis.nutrients.phosphorus} • K:{" "} {analysis.nutrients.potassium}

Environment

{location ? `${location.city || "Your Area"}, ${location.country || ""}` : "Location detected"}

{weather ? `${weather.temperature}°C • ${weather.humidity}% humidity` : "Using default weather pattern"}

{/* Recommended crops list */}

Recommended Crops

Ranked by suitability for your soil and conditions

{analysis.recommendedCrops?.map((crop, index) => ( ))}
{/* Growth timeline for selected crop */} {selectedCrop && (

Growth Timeline – {selectedCrop.name}

{selectedCrop.growthTimeline?.map((stage, idx) => (

{stage.stage}

{stage.duration}

{stage.description}

))}
)}
); }
